resources.string: select distinct b._id,b.id,b.enName name,b.enDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) and c.type=1001 limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select distinct b._id,b.id,b.enName name,b.enDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) and c.type=1001 AND favorite=1 limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select b._id,b.id,b.enName name,b.enDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) AND ic.categoryid like ? limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select c._id,c.id,c.enName name,count(ic.itemId) entities from category c left join itemCategory ic on c.id=ic.categoryId where (c.enName like ? or c.arName like ? or keywords like ?) and type=%3$s group by c.id order by count(ic.itemId) desc limit %1$s,%2$s
select id,uri,enName name from contact where itemid=? order by uri desc
